original_title: ほんとうに映った!監死カメラ 4
overview: Do our eyes perceive all that there is to this world? Sometimes the camera seems to pick up more than we can see with the naked eye. In the 'PSC' series a team of ghost-hunters analyzes authentic paranormal footage captured on home videos and surveillance cameras all across Japan. Fourth entry in the PSC series.
title: Paranormal Surveillance Camera 4
